channel.title: Projects on Jordyn Burman
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jordyn Burman

item.title: Project 4 - Perse
item.description: CURRENTLY IN PROGRESS, WILL DISPLAY CODE IN GITHUB ONCE COMPLETE Using Java and JDABuilder to develop a bot (named Perse - pronounced like Percy) that performs administrative tasks for staff members and provide an interactive experience for users in Discord servers. Active Commands: ping, 8ball, roll any sided dice, kick, mute In progress: ban, moderation logs, role assignment

item.title: Project 3 - 'Project: Brink' Indie Game
item.description: Individually designed and developed an indie game idea, presented proposal to the instructor, and received approval to venture forth and develop a game Created a 3-D first person survival horror game using Unity Technologies and Visual Studio C# Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2 - Webscraping with BeautifulSoup4
item.description: Utilized BeautifulSoup4 package and Pycharm to webscrape a shopping website’s data on Macbook products Converted the data collected into a .csv file for readability Determined which sale is best to purchase based on price listings, specifications, and ratings collected using Microsoft Excel 2019 Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 1 - Introductory Machine Learning with R
item.description: Utilized the R programming language and the random forest regression algorithm Created a model that predicts which passengers survived the sinking of the Titanic Cleaned and joined data sets to improve the accuracy of the predictive model from 75% to nearly 80% Link to GitHub Repository
